docna.cdata!:
Zaire - Second Education Project : Credit
            0624 - Credit Agreement - Conformed

display_title.display_title:
Zaire - Second Education Project
            : Credit 0624 - Credit Agreement - Conformed

18223934.count: Congo, Democratic Republic of,CONGO, DEMOCRATIC REPUBLIC OF

abstracts.cdata!:
The Second Education Project for Zaire
            components include: (a) construction, furniture, equipment,
            and technical assistance for five new rural primary teacher
            training institutes, including five new primary schools for
            practice teaching; (b) rehabilitation, repair, equipment,
            and technical assistance for six agricultural technician
            training institutes and one Higher Institute of Agricultural
            Studies; (c) fellowship programs; (d) evaluation of new
            programs promoted in the rural primary teacher training
            institutes and in the agricultural training institutes; and
            (e) pre-investment studies.

abstracts.cdata!:
Project components include: (a)
            construction, furniture, equipment and technical assistance
            for five new rural primary teacher training institutes,
            including five new primary schools for practice teaching;
            (b) rehabilitation, repair, equipment and technical
            assistance for six agricultural technician training
            institutes and one Higher Institute of Agricultural Studies;
            (c) fellowship programs; (d) evaluation of new programs
            promoted in the rural primary teacher training institutes
            and in the agricultural training institutes; and (e)
            pre-investment studies.
